item.title: Bella Culley home after early Georgia jail release
item.description: The 19-year-old Teessider, who was charged with drug trafficking, is eight months pregnant.

item.title: Arsenal's Dowman becomes youngest Champions League player at 15
item.description: Max Dowman becomes the youngest player in Champions League history after coming on against Slavia Prague on Tuesday, aged 15 years and 308 days.

item.title: Cheney expanded presidential power. Now Trump is doing the same
item.description: There was no lost love between the two Republicans, but both used a similar political playbook to push their agenda.

item.title: LIV Golf to change to 72-hole format
item.description: LIV Golf events will be extended to 72 holes from 2026, putting them in line with the sport's established tours.

item.title: Israel receives coffin Hamas says contains Gaza hostage's body
item.description: Israeli forces will now transfer the remains to the National Centre of Forensic Medicine in Tel Aviv for identification.
